text: Pen Jisas God agnɨgep kal awl kab wali kus gɨl yek ak mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop takaw agñɨ mɨdɨlɨg, meg mɨgan dad aplanɨl agak, Nɨbi yɨp nɨgtep gɨl, akal nɨb ownek ak nepɨm akaŋ agak? Pen yad ke gos nɨŋɨd ma ownek agak. Bɨ nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak nep, yɨp agyokek ownek agak. Pen nɨbi nop ma nepɨm agak.
